elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Answer the following questions about market research.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What are the three areas of interest in market research?
elements.correctAnswer: Facts (factual research), opinions (opinion research) and motives (motive research)

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Which area of market research is suitable for clarifying whether the promotional items are in the most frequented places in your company?
elements.correctAnswer: Market observation: Observation of the flow of customers through your business with a camera or by sales staff.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Who/what is the subject of the market research? (In other words: about whom/what is information collected?)
elements.correctAnswer: Customers; competition; own retail business; market environment

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Answer the following questions about market research.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: What does a retail company want to find out through market research? Put a cross in the box.
choices: How the retailer's market is made up.
correctAnswer: How the retailer's market is made up.
